cis.monopoly.gamePlay

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object

    GameController

    This class controls all of the different values within the game. This includes all the players, the spaces/properties, and the bank. This class defines how players move throughout the board, make transactions with the bank and other players
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Kyle Turske

      • MAX_SPACES

        public static final int MAX_SPACES
        Total number of spaces. Used for checking potential overflows.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController()
        GameController constructor. Holds all the different values needed in order to run the game properly.

    • Method Detail

      • activatePlayers

        public void activatePlayers(int playerCount)
        Used to activate a specified number players in the controller. The HowManyPlayersGUI class uses this method to be sure the right number of players are actually in play.
        Parameters:
        playerCount - The number of players in play

      • deactivateAllPlayers

        public void deactivateAllPlayers()
        Deactivates all of the players in the controller and resets their different values. Used if the user changes their mind on the number of players and goes back to the HowManyPlayersGUI from the PlayerInfoGUI.

      • runPlayerTurn

        public void runPlayerTurn(int roll,
                          Player player)
        Utilized to complete a player turn. Calls the methods movePlayer, spaceCheck, and changeCurrentPlayer.
        Parameters:
        roll - Dice roll
        player - Player

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(Player p,
                       int roll)
        Changes the Player's position value. If the player's position plus the roll go over the max amount of spaces, then the value will rollover back to zero and continue. Otherwise, this method just adds the roll amount to the current player position
        Parameters:
        p - Player
        roll - Dice roll

      • getDice

        public GameDice getDice()
        Used by the GamePlayScene to get the dice attributes in order to draw the dice properly.
        Returns:
        dice

      • playerPayBank

        public void playerPayBank(Player p,
                          int amount)
        The amount given is subtracted from the player's balance whilst that same amount is given to the bank.
        Parameters:
        p - Player
        amount - Amount for transaction

      • bankPayPlayer

        public void bankPayPlayer(Player p,
                          int amount)
        The amount given is added to the player's balance whilst that same amount is taken from the bank.
        Parameters:
        p - Player
        amount - Amount for transaction

      • transferPlayerFunds

        public static void transferPlayerFunds(Player p1,
                                       Player p2,
                                       int amount)
        The amount given is subtracted from the first player's balance, whilst the amount given is added to the second player's balance.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player giving funds
        p2 - Player getting funds
        amount - Amount for transaction

      • everyonePayPlayer

        public void everyonePayPlayer(Player p,
                              int amount)
        Everyone who is not the player being called pays said player.
        Parameters:
        p - The player who is getting paid.
        amount - The amount each player pays the current player.

      • playerPayEveryone

        public void playerPayEveryone(Player p,
                              int amount)
        Everyone who is not the player being called gets paid by said player.
        Parameters:
        p - The player who is paying.
        amount - The amount each player is getting paid by the current player.

      • playerBuyProperty

        public void playerBuyProperty(Player player,
                              Property prop)
        This method calls the payPayBank method and then sets the ownerId of the property to the player's ID. The price of the property will be cut in half since that players get half of what they paid back if they sell it to the bank.
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        prop - Property for sale

      • playerSellProperty

        public void playerSellProperty(Player player,
                               Property prop)
        This method calls bankPayPlayer which the bank gives whatever the price of the property is, then the property owner ID is then set to 0 for resale.
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        prop - Property being sold back

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        This method will search through the list of players in order to find the player that shares an id with the "currentPlayer" value.
        Returns:
        player Current Player

      • getSpecificPlayer

        public Player getSpecificPlayer(int iD)
        This method will search through the list of players in order to get the player that has id that matches the given value.
        Parameters:
        iD - playID
        Returns:
        player Player's ID who matches the given

      • getCurrentPlayerPosition

        public Property getCurrentPlayerPosition()
        Searches through the list of properties, and if the property owner ID matches the current player's ID, then that property will be returned.
        Returns:
        prop Property where the currentPlayer is.

      • getSpecificProperty

        public Property getSpecificProperty(int propID)
        Searches through the list of properties for a specific property.
        Parameters:
        propID - The id of the desired property
        Returns:
        The property if it is found, and null if it is not.

      • getNearestPropInGroup

        public Property getNearestPropInGroup(int spaceID,
                                      int groupID)
        Gets the nearest property that is inside a specified group to a specific space.
        Parameters:
        spaceID - The space that is being compared.
        groupID - The group of the desired space. Usually a bus stop or utility space.
        Returns:
        The property inside the desired group closest to the space that was called

      • spaceCheck

        public void spaceCheck(int roll)
        This method is part of the player turn. Gets the current player and the current player's position. If the space has no owner and is up for purchase (ownerID = 0), then the buyProperty method will be called. If the property's ownerID isn't equal to negative one, zero, or the the current player's ID, then rent will be payed to the owner of that property.
        Parameters:
        roll - the roll that the player made during their turn.

      • getSpaceCheckID

        public int getSpaceCheckID()
        Used for checking if the player moved after the space check.
        Returns:
        The player's previous position

      • propSharedOwnerCount

        public int propSharedOwnerCount(int spaceID)
        Counts the number of properties that a property in a group has a shared owner. Used inside the propertyRentMultiplier method.
        Parameters:
        spaceID - The ID of the space the player has landed on.
        Returns:
        The number of shared owners for a space.

      • buyProperty

        public void buyProperty(Player player,
                        Property prop)
        A dialogue box pops asking the player if they would like to purchase the property. If the player clicks on "Yes" then the property's ownerID will be set to the player's then the playerPayBank method will be called.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who is purchasing the property
        prop - The property up for purchase

      • getPropertyList

        public java.util.List<Property> getPropertyList()
        Gets the list of the properties from the controller. Used for house and hotel purchasing.
        Returns:
        The list of properties

      • changeCurrentPlayer

        public void changeCurrentPlayer()
        This method changes the currentPlayer value in this class. If the addition will roll-over the the total number of players, then the current player will be changed to player 1. If the next player is not in play, then the method will be called again. If that next player is in jail, then their sentence will be lowered and the method will be called again.

      • getBankFunds

        public int getBankFunds()
        Give the bank funds. Used to update the bank label on the GamePlayScene class.
        Returns:
        bank Bank Balance

      • addBankFunds

        public void addBankFunds(int amount)
        Adds funds to the bank.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount added to the bank.

      • subtractBankFunds

        public void subtractBankFunds(int amount)
        Subtracts funds from the bank.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount taken from the bank.

      • playerGoToJail

        public void playerGoToJail(Player player)
        When the player lands on the "GO TO JAIL" space, they will be sent to the jail space and their inJailCount will be set to three.
        Parameters:
        player - The current player being placed in jail.
